targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'running_instances' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'running_tasks' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'free_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'used_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'free_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'used_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'free_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" = 'used_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
select last(value) from libvirt_check_value WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "virt_value" WHERE "type" = 'virt_cpu_total' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT (last("free") / last("total"))  FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "path" = '/var/lib/nova/instances' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /vcpus/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /ram/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /disk/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /running/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'disk_ops' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'disk_time' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'if_packets' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'if_octets' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'if_errors' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "virt_0" WHERE "type" = 'if_dropped' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "virt_value" WHERE "type" = 'memory' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

list.label: Hosts
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "libvirt_check_value" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Instances
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "virt_value" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
